
```{r DataName.lm}
DataName.lm = lm(ResponseName ~ FactorName, data=DataName)
library(broom)
augment(DataName.lm)
anova(DataName.lm)
```

```{r glanceDataName.lm}
glance(DataName.lm) %>% kable()
```

```{r plotDataName.lm, fig.cap="Residual analysis for DataName.lm"}
library(ggfortify)
autoplot(DataName.lm)
```
